title: Comic book reading among young people in the UK 2015 , by demographic
summary: This is a bar chart representing Demographic in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 34.0 is found at Demographic Boys and the minimum is found at KS5 where Demographic is 14.4.
The Share of respondents of Demographic Boys is 2.36% larger than the minimum value at KS5.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Demographic, and Share of respondents in each Demographic on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Demographic Boys and lowest at Demographic KS5.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Demographic in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 34.0 is found at Demographic Boys and the minimum is found at KS5 where Demographic is 14.4.
The Share of respondents of Demographic Boys is 2.36% larger than the minimum value at KS5.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Demographic, and Share of respondents in each Demographic on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Demographic Boys and lowest at Demographic KS5.
There is a difference of 19.6 between the maximum Demographic Boys and minimum Demographic KS5.
Demographic Boys is higher than any other Demographics with value 34.0, followed by Mixed, and KS2. Down to Demographic KS5 with the lowest value 14.4.
The Demographic KS5 has 1.32 times less Share of respondents than average.
